version_description:
• New Chapter! In Chapter 13: Fire and Brimstone, Eli escapes the Darkbane prison and must prevent the Darkbane army from invading Slugterra through the slug gate!
• New ghoul! Head to the arsenal to unlock Aquafreak!
• Minor bug fixes

• New Chapter! In Chapter 14: Found in Dreams, battle intriguing opponents in Eli’s dream as he struggles with constant visions of Dr. Blakk.
• New Slug! Head to the arsenal to unlock Armashelt
• Minor bug fixes and optimization
• Challenge mode
